resources.string: This feature will be added in soon. Please stay tuned :)
By continuing, you agree to our [privacy policy](%s) and [terms of service](%s).
Different AI models have different system requirements and chat accuracy. Please select a model that fits your device.
Your personal AI assistant is ready to help you anytime, even without internet connection!
The most lightweight AI chat assistant model for mobile. Recommended for old devices with low RAM. Size: 150 MB.
Recommended for most AI assistant use cases. Better chat experience and accuracy than the Lite AI model. Size: 400 MB.
The most accurate AI chat model for mobile. Gives more accurate responses than other models. Size: 900 MB.
Test AI model. Not recommended for public use.
Please write a letter to my teacher that informs I\'m sick so I can\'t go to school.

Dear [Teacher's Name], I hope this letter finds you in good health.

I am writing to inform you that I am feeling unwell and, as a result, will not be able to attend school today. I have consulted a doctor and they have advised me to stay at home and rest until I am fully recovered.

Thank you for your understanding and I hope to be back in school soon.
Unable to delete a currently active AI model
The updated version of this AI model with performance and accuracy improvements.
By continuing, you agree to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy (Click here to view)
Keep in mind that once deleted, you need to download the model again.
Notification is needed to show the download progress

Hello! I'm ChatMagic AI. I'm here to assist you. I can do the following:
1. Answer questions and give explanations
2. Assist in writing a text based content
3. Follow simple instructions

However, I still have limitations. I may write incorrect information or produce harmful instructions. Please use me with caution.
